DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect provide supplement contain alternative combination micronutrient pregnancy birth weight infant maternal health nutritional outcome rural area Nepal .
DOC.detailed_description: Maternal micronutrient deficiency common develop world may influence intrauterine growth fetal neonatal health survival . Currently , policy antenatal supplementation beyond iron-folic acid place setting . And yet , efficacy supplementation strategy well establish . Specifically , clear multiple micronutrient combination enhance fetal growth newborn health survival compare single small combination micronutrient . Also , birth weight may serve proxy measure newborn health , infant morbidity mortality need direct examination . Comparisons : Pregnant woman receive daily folic acid , folic acid plus iron , folic acid plus iron plus zinc , multiple micronutrient supplement contain 11 nutrient vitamin A compare control group receive vitamin A .
DOC.criteria: Married woman reproductive age identify new pregnancy use urine test Menopausal sterilize woman currently already pregnant breastfeed infant < 9 month age
